`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`


Content that is pushed by an algorithm into the consumer's view. [^1]

**See**:: [[Tiktok]], [[internet]]
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
